*Guide for use*: The below is all the potential search terms to use with nexus. Start by searching (using the search function) for the name of the company you want + query, e.g. 'AGL Energy Query'. Then copy everything in that section, and paste into Nexus. 


### AGL Energy query:

```{r message=F, echo=F, warning=F}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)


data <- read_xlsx('ALex.xlsx')


names<- c('search_1', 'term', 'search_2')

colnames(data) <- names



text <- paste(unlist(data$search_2), collapse =" OR ")

data$search_2 <- text

data_2 <- head(data, n = 21)

engagement_terms <- paste(unlist(na.omit(data$term)), collapse =" OR ")

data_2$term <- engagement_terms

data_2$search_1 <- paste0(data_2$search_1, ' AND')
data_2$search_2 <- paste0('AND ', data_2$search_2)




data_2$all_terms <- paste(data_2$search_1, data_2$term, data_2$search_2, sep = ' ')
                            

print(data_2$all_terms[1])


#writexl::write_xlsx(data_2,'alex_separate_cols.xlsx')

```
